About Jaywant Industries

Our Mission

To provide reliable, compliant, and environmentally sound bio-medical waste management solutions, safeguarding public health and preserving our planet for future generations.

Our Vision

To be the leading and most trusted partner for bio-medical waste management in the Yavatmal region, recognized for our commitment to excellence, sustainability, and community well-being.

Who We Are

Jaywant Industries operates a state-of-the-art Common Bio-medical Waste Treatment Facility (CBWTF) strategically located in the MIDC area of Yavatmal, Maharashtra. We are fully authorized by the Maharashtra Pollution Control Board (MPCB) and strictly adhere to the guidelines set by the Central Pollution Control Board (CPCB) and the Bio-medical Waste Management Rules, 2016 (and subsequent amendments).

Our dedicated team comprises experienced professionals passionate about environmental safety and public health. We leverage advanced technology and rigorous processes to ensure the safe and effective handling, treatment, and disposal of bio-medical waste.

Our Core Values

  • Compliance Unwavering adherence to all regulations.
  • Sustainability Minimizing environmental footprint.
  • Safety Protecting our team, clients, and community.
  • Reliability Dependable and timely service.
  • Innovation Continuously improving our methods.
